- Not included textures because come from main game
descriptionHtml:
Hello everyone i hope you found it useful this modders resources for your mods
Feel free to add screenshots
If you like this resources please endorse
================================================================================================================================
About modders resources:

- This modders resources give you the ability to open all Drawers
- This modders resources is made using NifSkope,ChunkMerge and vanilla meshes
- This modders resources only included modified vanilla meshes
- Not included textures because come from main game
================================================================================================================================
Included meshes in this modders resources:

>>> Set 01 Orc Dresser <<<

- OrcDresser01_Static
- OrcDresser01LowerDrawer01_Container
- OrcDresser01TopDrawer01_Container

>>> Set 02 Orc End Table <<<

- OrcEndTable01_Static
- OrcEndTable01LowerDrawer01_Container
- OrcEndTable01TopDrawer01_Container

================================================================================================================================
Credits: - Bethesda,NifSkope team,ChunkMerge team
================================================================================================================================
Permission : - You can use for free without asking for permission in your mods as long you credit me as author of this modders resources
                   - For modify and other things see permission tab
================================================================================================================================
